method: In a bowl, combine the chopped cactus, mashed avocado, chopped red onion, chopped cilantro, lime juice, minced garlic, salt, and pepper.
Gently mash and stir the ingredients together until well combined.
Let the guacamole sit for at least 15 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
Serve with tortilla chips or as a topping for tacos or grilled meats.
